sentences.en: Abstract: Both cohesion and thematic progression play important roles in discourse coherence.
sentences.cn: 文摘: 衔接与主位推进都对语篇的连贯起着重要作用,但其作用的发挥必须以话题相关为前提.

sentences.en: Both cohesion and thematic progression play important roles in discourse coherence.
sentences.cn: 衔接与主位推进都对语篇的连贯起着重要作用,但其作用的发挥必须以话题相关为前提.

sentences.en: Ecological landscape mapping is one of the fields of thematic mapping.
sentences.cn: 生态景观制图是专题制图学的重要发展方向之一.

sentences.en: Grid: A surface thematic interpolating point data over a region.
sentences.cn: 网格: 一种表面专题插值数据点的区域.

sentences.en: He has a series of thematic commemorative stamps.
sentences.cn: 他有一系列专题纪念邮票.

sentences.en: Please assemble this material into thematic groups.
sentences.cn: 请按主题将这些材料整理分类。

sentences.en: Textual meta function consists of such three aspects as thematic structure, information structure and cohesion.
sentences.cn: 语篇功能包括主位结构 、 信息结构和衔接三个方面.

sentences.en: The thematic fashion colour trends palette.
sentences.cn: 主题时装色彩趋势的调色板.

sentences.en: the thematic organization of paintings in the exhibit
the thematic structure of a text
The volume may be approached from several thematic directions.
sentences.cn: 研究本书可以从几个主题着手.

sentences.en: Thematic analysis plays a very important role in linguistic studies.
sentences.cn: 摘要角色分析在语言研究中占有举足轻重的地位.

sentences.en: Thematic maps should always be annotated with the source and date of the topical information.
sentences.cn: 各类专题地图,均应注明专题资料来源和日期.

sentences.en: Thematic Shading -- Making tabular data easy for a reader to understand.
sentences.cn: 专题底纹 - 制作表格数据便于读者理解.

sentences.en: Thematic vowels are part of the stem.
sentences.cn: 词干元音是词干的一部分.

sentences.en: To save your thematic map, simply save it as a workspace.
sentences.cn: 为了节省您的专题地图, 只需将其保存为工作区.

trans.tran_cn: 词干的，题目的，主题的，论题的
trans.tran_en: relating to a particular  theme  , or organized according to a theme
